@graph.title: Handbook of research on advancements in supercritical fluids applications for sustainable energy systems / Lin Chen (Chinese Academy of Sciences, China) ; Volume 1
abstract: "This book deals with energy conversion and fluid dynamics categories. It discusses supercritical fluids, from the perspective of a new set of fluid manipulation and operations in a wide range of energy related systems/applications"--

Advancements in supercritical fluids applications for sustainable energy systems / Lin Chen, Chinese Academy of Sciences, China -- Application of supercritical carbon dioxide for solar water heater / Yuhiro Iwamoto, Nagoya Institute of Technology, Japan Hiroshi Yamaguchi, Doshisha University, Japan -- Numerical and experimental study of abnormal thermo-mechanical effects in supercritical fluid / Victor Emelyanov, Ishlinsky Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Moscow, Russia, Russian Federation Alexander Gorbunov, Ishlinsky Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation Andrey Lednev, Ishlinsky Institute for Problems in Mechanics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Russian Federation.
